item.title: Vallerret Photography Gloves - Initial Thoughts
item.description: Vallerret Photography Gloves Vallerret Photography Gloves I first came across the Vallerret Photography Gloves on Kickstarter back in December 2015 and today they were waiting for me when I got home from the coffee morning. They got my attention as I’ve never found a pair of gloves that will keep my hands warm and allow me to operate my camera as well. It was either cold hands or fumbling with the camera, with the increased risk of dropping it.
